hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Slingshot#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest
